godot_binding_version.description: The version of godot cpp binding to use to build with.

use_mingw.description:
If true, Mingw will be used to compile to Windows instead of Visual Studio.
Only applicable on Windows host platforms.

use_llvm.description:
If true, Clang will be used to compile to Linux instead of GCC.
Only applicable on Linux host platforms.

android_ndk_path.description:
The path to the android NDK root. 
Required to compile to Android.

xcode_path.description:
The path to XCode. 
Required to compile to iOS.
